about_the_game:
Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CodeArk: Galaxy Frontiers, you will find several unique and expertly crafted pixel monsters for your game!

The universe has unfathomable mysteries just waiting to be discovered. The Intergalactic Federation keeps the peace so the denizens of the known galaxies may thrive, while infamous bounty hunters and explorers seek to find the boundaries of the universe itself. But little do they know, there are otherworldly alien beings awaiting them on the other side. Featuring a wide selection of futuristic robots, alien monsters and space pirates, this pack is sure to add additional flair to your game!

Contents:

- 19 unique battler sprites, with 5 recolors per each individual sprites, bringing the total to 125.
- Charset version of all the battlers, also in a total of 125.
- 2X and 3X size of the sprites for user convenience to use in different resolutions!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

short_description: Get your spaceship’s shields up and prepare for battle, because the MT Tiny Tales - CodeArk Galaxy Frontiers pack is ready to turn your game into a sci-fi slug fest!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
